project.description: The web of bak jenkins resources.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: community
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: community:openeuler/mindspore/openlookeng/infra note: choose which community to update

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" GITEE_EMAIL="xiangxinyong@huawei.com" PROJECT_NAME=""
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
echo "#######################start to product docker image#######################" echo "current path:"`pwd` echo "current image version:"${IMAGE_VERSION} cd jenkins_bak_recover/jenkins_bak_cron/ docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:${IMAGE_VERSION} . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:${IMAGE_VERSION} docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:${IMAGE_VERSION}
if [ "$community" == "openeuler" ]; then
echo "##########begin update openeuler jenkins backup service#########"
PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-cn-north4-jenkins-2"
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/jenkins-cn-north4-2 else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update openeuler bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
echo "##########finish update openeuler jenkins backup service#########"
elif [ "$community" == "mindspore" ]; then
echo "##########begin update mindspore jenkins backup service#########"
PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-jenkins-master"
if [ -d "infra-mindspore" ]; then rm -rf "infra-mindspore" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-mindspore cd infra-mindspore/applications/jenkins-cn-north4 else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update mindspore bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
echo "##########finish update mindspore jenkins backup service#########"
elif [ "$community" == "opengauss" ]; then
echo "##########begin update opengauss jenkins2 backup service#########"
#PROJECT_NAME="opengauss-hk-new-cce-jenkins"
elif [ "$community" == "openlookeng" ]; then
echo "##########begin update openlookeng jenkins backup service#########"
PROJECT_NAME="openlookeng-jenkins-ingress"
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openlookeng-jenkins else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update openlookeng bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
echo "##########finish update openlookeng jenkins backup service#########"
elif [ "$community" == "infra" ]; then
echo "##########begin update infra jenkins backup service#########"
PROJECT_NAME="control-jenkins"
if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/control/jenkins else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/openeuler/bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update infra bak-jenkins:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
echo "##########finish update infra jenkins backup service#########"
fi
ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
